channel.title: Actual oldschool server (317) Pking Recovery 06
channel.description:
[CENTER][SIZE="6"]Recovery06[/SIZE] This is an open beta for recovery, so im changing things and updating as i go along, the server is extremely basic right now i added shops and a few areas to make it playable and im looking for in-game suggestions. You can call the server what ever you want I could careless. Otherwise come play:)
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/1t7ms1.png[/img]
[COLOR="Red"]Instructions on server ~ to Start earning money run to the general store and buy all of your training supplies then head into the bank and click on the training teleport, cows currently drop 50,000 gp per kill.[/COLOR]
[I][B]TLTR: This is an 06 server loading a 317 cache set up for pking[/B][/I]
~Features Perfect PVP combat Most Sounds 06 317 Cache 100% Crafting More will be listed later
[I][B]*Also im in need of staff*[/B][/I]
[QUOTE]Client [url=http://up.ht/RsCarm]Download Recovery.rar @ UppIT[/url] [/QUOTE]
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/16ghma8.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/10pn98l.png[/img]
[/CENTER]
